replies.body: It sounds like there's a bigger problem we need to address first: why your game crashed in the first place. There's probably some corrupted game files somewhere if this has happened more than once, since you wouldn't have ended up with a leaverbuster if the game hadn't crashed. Run through our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and test it in a custom or practice game.
